reviews.review: Absoloutly amazing film with an extremely emotional ending, amazing fight scenes all with an awesome storyline and a massive array of intersting characters and settings.
This may very well be the best marvel movie yet. It was fantastic the best avengers movie yet and I can’t wait for avengers 4!!!

This movie just keeps getting better and better after watching few times. Great cast and great actors... really makes huge impact! A tear jerker and enjoyable film all throughout. A culmination of 10 years worth of character development and storyline investment-brings us to one massive film (2-part?). Amazingly done with even screen share for everybody in the film. This is not just an Avenger film, this is very much a Thanos film as well! You don't leave the cinema with hate of the villain but a sense of understanding. A true movie for everyone to enjoy not just for Marvel fans!
I think it was good, I'm no professional critic but the ending was unsatisfying, the fight scenes were ok but had some moments that were bad to me still it was good, I strongly recommend you to watch
Great movie! It’s funny at times and has a good story. Can’t wait to see what happens next.
What the hell ? There is no way possible to give such high stars  to this movie.I like characters but the plot is below even a  comic level.

No plot, no acting , nothing 
Just a pile of sh*t put together 
Spoilers 
(At Marvel studios) "lets bring all our heroes together and let them fight and get their fail and beat down and in the end (spoiler) , let kill most of them thin after the long ass credit lets kill more and then put a teaser for our next sh*t movie about Captain Marvel who most people doesn't know sh*t about Him/her, the fans will pay for this sh*t anyway"
Ewoks & Tom Hank as Woody might have been over the top cameos otherwise a perfect film.

The best thing I can say about this movie is for it's scale and scope it is largely coherent.  

The worst thing I can say is that it's seldom compelling.

Avengers: Infinity war is a movie that will make you laugh, cry and feel excitment and happiness all at the same time. It never disappoints. The movie is filled with unexpected twists and surprising moments. Thanos is an amazing villian with a great motive and backstory. The movie is filled with tons of characters and action. The movie didn't seem oversaturated to me because they were able to give enough screentime for each character. Overall, Avengers: Infinity War is the best marvel movie in my opinion, and it was able to exceed all my expectations.
